attributes.action: Oblige all M.P.s upon election to relocate to their place of work which is London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will save the hard pressed tax payer from having to pay for the purchase and upkeep of their second home.Constituency work can continue to be done by office staff in the constituency. After all when an ordinary citizen from one part of the country obtains employment in another part of the country he either commutes or moves to that location, family and all.He does not expect nor receive tax payers money to keep two homes going. Then and only then will M.P.s be able to say "do as I do" and not " do as I say." Their "gravy train" must be derailed...now!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
